subject: docs(guide): broaden tags vs properties into title vs tags vs properties
body:
The guide covered tags vs properties but never explained the title's
role as the primary deduplication key. This left AI assistants without
clear guidance on what belongs in the title versus tags or properties.

Adds:
- "The three fields" section explaining title, tags, and properties
- Decision rule covering all three fields
- Title examples in the examples table
- "Title vs tags: a common mistake" anti-pattern table showing how
  embedding categories in titles breaks deduplication
- Renamed "When it's ambiguous" to "When tags vs properties is ambiguous"
  for clarity now that the section covers all three fields

Tags: docs, ai-guide, import, naming
Complexity: 2
Urgency: 2
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: paid
Epic: fix-import-compatibility
Semver: patch

title: broaden tags vs properties into title vs tags vs properties
